programme.title: All I Need for Christmas
programme.desc: Looking for inspiration, singer-songwriter Maggie travels home and finds a spark with app developer Archer, who is trying to repair his relationship with his sister.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose becomes convinced she is dead after suffering an esophageal spasm; after this experience she decides to live for the day.

programme.desc: Frasier experiences a midlife crisis when broadcasters announce he will receive a lifetime-achievement award.

programme.desc: Three generations of Cranes clash in the great outdoors when Frasier's 13-year-old son (Trevor Einhorn) visits.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier and Niles try to boost their masculinity by taking an automobile repair class.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier attempt to restore luster to the tarnished career of a favorite Shakespearean actor.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Norm hears rumors from his neighbor about Vera and the man next door.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The gang at Cheers calls in a ringer to help the pub win a bowling match against a rival bar.

programme.desc: Shawn and Gus receive a mysterious email inviting them to the Cinnamon Festival in a quirky small town.

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: When they do not follow police procedure, Shawn and Gus are forced to attend the Police Academy.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier exists in two Valentine's Day universes, one with a beautiful waitress (Charlotte Ross) and the other alone.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier begins dating a woman (Illeana Douglas), unaware that she is the wife of his station manager (Tom McGowan).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles sinks a half-court shot for a huge prize at a Seattle SuperSonics game, reigniting the sibling rivalry.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz asks Frasier to narrate her space documentary, but things sour when she asks John Glenn to replace him.

programme.title: Once Upon a Prince
programme.desc: Susanna accepts help one day from Nate at her parents' store in Georgia. Sparks between them fly, but when a photo of them gets leaked to the press, Susanna is in for the shock of her life when Nate is called back home for his coronation as a king.

programme.title: A Tail of Love
programme.desc: When Bella discovers the funding for her dog rescue center is being discontinued, she turns to JR, a caring soldier who becomes attached to one of her rescues and her.

programme.title: A Very Venice Romance
programme.desc: Amy travels to Venice, Italy, to lure chef Marcello into helping her company's new venture. When Marcello declines, she signs up for his advanced cooking course to make her case.

programme.title: Paging Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: When an overly serious scholar attends an annual Jane Austen conference, she has a sudden change of heart when she strikes a deal with the man who's playing Mr. Darcy.

programme.title: Two Tickets to Paradise
programme.desc: When two weddings are ruined by both the bride and groom getting left at the altar, they still decide to take their honeymoons, not knowing they are heading to the same resort in Hawaii.

programme.title: Her Pen Pal
programme.desc: An event planner can't wait to attend -- and plan -- her best friend's wedding in Paris. However, when she finds out her ex is bringing a date, she reconnects with her French childhood pen pal.

programme.title: The Royal We
programme.desc: When her older sister elopes with a non-royal, Princess Bea, who has lived her life away from her royal duties, must step in and honor the arranged marriage to a small kingdom prince.

programme.title: Return to Office
programme.desc: After making the return to the office on a hybrid schedule, two coworkers known to each other only as Ms. Monday and Mr. Tuesday start sending friendly notes, sparking an office romance.

programme.desc: Angela Petrillo pays a return visit to Miami, making her sister's life miserable.

programme.desc: After attending a sorority reunion, Blanche considers having a face lift.

programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.desc: Dorothy dismays when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband.

programme.desc: When Van and Cheyenne go out of town for Van's football game, Reba is upset to find they have asked Barbra Jean to take care of Elizabeth.

programme.desc: Van insists on coaching Reba after she agrees to compete against Brock in a 5K race to raise money for Jake's school.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van announces he is quitting school to try out for arena football, but Reba's disapproval causes him to blow his chance.

programme.desc: Rosemary's play gets a new venue and a new cast; Elizabeth takes her curriculum to the airwaves; Faith helps a friend make a decision; Lucas faces unexpected opposition.

programme.title: Come Fly With Me
programme.desc: The daughter of an Air Force captain and the daughter of a widower hatch a plan to bring their single parents together.

programme.desc: Cleo Morelli, an aspiring Portland chef, tries to win a food truck competition. When a handsome chef from a rival food truck parks across the street from her, Cleo's goal to win takes a spicy turn.

programme.desc: After becoming the subject of an award-winning magazine cover, a woman embarks on a quest to uncover the true identity of the photographer who snapped her photo.

programme.desc: A Los Angeles event coordinator learns that her estranged uncle has recently passed away and left her a chalet in Vail, Colo.
